thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 10 of 7322
thread.title: Brandon Bean Fisher
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Brandon Bean Fisher

author: Brandon Bean Fisher
title: Brandon Bean Fisher
text:
EVERY time that I've ordered something from B+H over the last 15 years, I have gotten it VERY quickly! And the very rare times when something was actually wrong, they had great communication and were a pleasure to deal with IMO!
I'll keep ordering from B+H over and over and over again because they're a rock solid company who actually puts the customer first and has great prices compared to their competitors as well :)
Overall a HIGHLY recommended company that I'll continue buying from ;)
